Class Game2

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game2

  • public class Game2
extends java.lang.Object
    A Game is a JFrame and a Driver that collects and stores information about its properties. A Game knows how to setup a layout with a level and an exit button. A Game also knows how to add Animations and Maps to its frame.
